about_the_game:
Take flight in a fantastical world where each platform brings you closer to the summit.

Discover Panem: Ascension, a platforming adventure where precision and patience are the keys to victory.

Key Features

  • 🎮 Stylized 3D Platforming – Charming low-poly graphics with smooth controls.

  • 🌍 Explore Diverse Biomes – Climb through castles, caves, and snowy plains.

  • 🏆 Only Challenges – Focus on mastering movement and exploration.

  • 📜 Environmental Storytelling – Unlock fragments of the world's lore as you ascend.

  • ⚠️ Simple Yet Demanding Gameplay – Every jump can bring you higher… or send you tumbling down.

🐉 Draconic Ascension – A Journey to Rebirth

A divine whisper echoes in the void. The Goddess speaks her final words:
"You have fulfilled your contract. Your memories are now mine. In return, I grant you your deepest desire… Rebirth as a dragon."

But before you are reborn, one final trial remains: climbing through the echoes of your past lives.

A True Test of Skill

  • 🎮 A 3D Platformer Inspired by Only Up! – Precision and patience are your greatest allies.

  • 🌍 6 Unique Zones – Each representing a past life, filled with distinct challenges and landscapes.

  • 🧩 Hidden Shortcuts – For the daring, secret paths allow for optimized routes to the top.

A Story to Uncover… or Ignore

  • 📜 Scattered Scrolls – Discover them to hear the Goddess recount your past and reveal your fate.

  • 🚀 Subtle Narrative – Rush to the peak or take your time to piece together your story.

A Minimalist, Immersive World

  • 🌍 A Carefully Crafted Low-Poly Style – Inspired by the mystical biomes of Ayana, a world rich with history and adventure from a vast RPG universe.

Will you rise through your memories and claim your rebirth?

name: Panem: Ascension

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 ou équivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 ou équivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB d’espace disponible MB available space

short_description: Ascend to your destiny! In Panem: Ascension, a challenging 3D platformer where every jump matters, traverse 6 zones representing your past lives to earn your rebirth as a dragon. Test your patience in this perilous climb!
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
